title: Recently Updated
posting_body: This GUT REHABBED building is in an amazing location that is truly close to everything you need for convenient lifestyle – East Rogers Park.
Close to the red line for commuting needs.
Brand new Target just down Sheridan.
Many great fine dining and brunch options available.
Bars aplenty for great nightlife choices.
Sheridan retail shopping just a skip away as well.
BUILDING AMENITIES
Loyola Beach a stones throw away for summertime enjoyment
Laundry located on-site
Recently renovated fitness center
Secured Access
24-hour maintenance technicians
Complimentary Internet.
Water, trash, sewer included in rent- resident only pays electric and gas.
**NO security deposit** Hardwood flooring throughout, microwave and dishwasher.
Each apartment has its own individually controlled heating/cooling centrally delivered.
For more information Call, Text, or email:
Alex Galambos
BJB Properties
Equal Housing Opportunity
Pictures are for marketing purposes and may not represent the exact unit available
Prices subject to change
